events.title: Bhopal Gas Tragedy
events.description: A gas leak at the Union Carbide pesticide plant in Bhopal, India, resulted in thousands of deaths and widespread health issues, marking one of the world's worst industrial disasters.
events.significance: This event highlighted the risks of industrial negligence and prompted changes in safety regulations worldwide.

events.title: First Successful Heart Transplant
events.description: Dr. Christiaan Barnard performed the first successful human heart transplant operation in Cape Town, South Africa.
events.significance: This groundbreaking surgery paved the way for advances in organ transplantation and cardiac surgery.

events.title: Rodney King Verdict and LA Riots
events.description: The verdict in the Rodney King police brutality case was announced, acquitting the officers involved and leading to widespread riots in Los Angeles.
events.significance: The events brought national attention to issues of racial injustice and police brutality in the United States.

events.title: UN Admits People's Republic of China
events.description: The United Nations General Assembly voted to admit the People's Republic of China and expel the Republic of China (Taiwan).
events.significance: This represented a major shift in international relations, recognizing the PRC as the legitimate government of China.
